page.title: 06SERVICES IN CROFT.
page.content: Although Croft and Dalton have no shops, a selection of mobile shops visits the villages regularly. A van comes each weekday morning to sell bread,cakes and sweets, while the well stocked greengrocer's van comes on Tuesday lunchtimes. Once a fortnight, on Wednesdays, the Mobile County Library van is in the villages, bringing a large selection of books, whilst the Mobile Video Van comes on Monday, Wednesday and Friday evenings. The Croft Spa Hotel is very old, and was where people stayed when they were taking the spa waters. Now the hotel has a hair-dressing salon and a sauna and keep-fit gymnasium. The tennis courts will soon be ready and plans are going ahead to open a swimming pool there.
